html: Swapna Burman, 6 toes in both legs, no money for special shoes. Father a rickshaw puller, mother working in a tea garden, running for her country in the final event of the Heptathlon with a bandaged jaw. And winning it for India This country certainly has no shortage of heroinespic.twitter.com/sZySHmGCdE
text:
Swapna Burman, 6 toes in both legs, no money for special shoes. Father a rickshaw puller, mother working in a tea garden, running for her country in the final event of the Heptathlon with a bandaged jaw. And winning it for India
This country certainly has no shortage of heroinespic.twitter.com/sZySHmGCdE

html: Hi everyone, The aftermath of floods see a huge rise in diseases. To help with this demand for doctors in #KeralaFloods, my friends (@JaspreetSMakkar, @RidhimaKh) and I have gotten together to set up a basic website for free medical consultation. We need your help. Please RT.pic.twitter.com/3Gn8WWajpt
text:
Hi everyone,
The aftermath of floods see a huge rise in diseases. To help with this demand for doctors in #KeralaFloods, my friends (@JaspreetSMakkar, @RidhimaKh) and I have gotten together to set up a basic website for free medical consultation. We need your help. Please RT.pic.twitter.com/3Gn8WWajpt

html: “.. go right through one of India’s most rich elephant and tiger habitats.” Seriously, there has to be another way. This is totally unnecessary. People are fine to drive around National reserves & sanctuaries. Please leave the animals alone.https://indianexpress.com/article/india/sc-said-no-to-highway-in-jim-corbett-but-moef-institute-agrees-to-help-clear-it-5312675/ …
text:
“.. go right through one of India’s most rich elephant and tiger habitats.” 

Seriously, there has to be another way. This is totally unnecessary. People are fine to drive around National reserves & sanctuaries. Please leave the animals alone.https://indianexpress.com/article/india/sc-said-no-to-highway-in-jim-corbett-but-moef-institute-agrees-to-help-clear-it-5312675/ …

html: To the Minister of School Education, West Bengal. There is a glaring error with the image used in one of the school text books to depict Milkha Singh-ji. Could you please request the publisher to recall and replace this book? Sincerely. @derekobrienmphttps://twitter.com/Lyfeghosh/status/1030748217892265984 …
text:
To the Minister of School Education, West Bengal. 
There is a glaring error with the image used in one of the school text books to depict Milkha Singh-ji. Could you please request the publisher to recall and replace this book? 
Sincerely. 

@derekobrienmphttps://twitter.com/Lyfeghosh/status/1030748217892265984 …
